turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I need you to order me a coffee from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK - What location do you want me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The same one as always. God you are completely incompetent.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it - the Arena Hub Starbucks then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes - I want a latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande - Like always. Jesus.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want 2% milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, are you trying to kill me? I want almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK - So a grande latte with almond milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes - and make sure it is hot this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK - An extra hot grande latte with almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, god. I just want it regular hot. Last time it was cold. Make sure they make it correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any flavors.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Then what flavor?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The same as always. You are so lucky we are related or I would fire you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know mom reminds me. So a grande latte regular hot with almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes - Text me the details and pick up time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok - I am calling the store now. I will text you the time it is ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good riddance. I mean goodbye.
